item.title: The ‘Anti-Trans’ Oxford Event That Wasn’t ‘Canceled’
item.description: People are increasingly willing to reject obvious falsehoods, and activists are decreasingly effective at intimidation.

item.title: Tariffs a Harsh New Demonstration of the Folly of Economic Planners
item.description: Trump has engineered something like a sanctions regime targeting Americans.

item.title: After Years of Woke Shows, MAGA Comes for the Smithsonian
item.description: Enforcing Trump’s EO on ‘Restoring Truth and Sanity to American History’ will take tough love, force, and deprogramming, and it won’t be pretty.

item.title: Wokeness Is Just One Facet of U.S. Intel’s Flaws
item.description: Intelligence agencies need reform, but simply eliminating offices involved with DEI and declaring it a victory for efficiency would miss the point.

item.title: A Faulty History of School Choice and Racism
item.description: What matters is whether school-choice programs have actually done any good. And they have.
